special_instruction: Please make it less spicy than usual, add extra raita on the side, and ensure the rice is well-cooked and fluffy.
Serve with fresh lemon wedges, add a small portion of garlic butter on top, and make sure it is grilled thoroughly but not burnt.
Add extra cheese slices, do not include onions or pickles, and please toast the buns lightly so they stay crunchy.
Make the sauce creamy with extra mushrooms, serve with garlic bread on the side, and sprinkle a bit of oregano on top before serving.
Cook it well so it is crispy outside but juicy inside, add extra salad on the side, and avoid using too much oil in the marination.
Make the gravy thick and creamy, add a little extra butter on top before serving, and avoid making it too sweet.
Use fresh romaine lettuce, add extra parmesan cheese, keep the croutons crunchy, and serve the dressing on the side.
Make the curry medium spicy, add extra gravy, and ensure the mutton pieces are soft and well-cooked.
Add extra vegetables like carrots and beans, reduce soy sauce slightly, and serve hot with chili sauce on the side.
Use fresh mozzarella cheese, bake until the crust is golden, and drizzle a small amount of olive oil before serving.
Include extra garlic sauce, add some spicy mayo, and wrap tightly to keep it warm and juicy.
Cook medium rare, add peppercorn sauce, serve with mashed potatoes and steamed vegetables on the side.
Add extra chicken pieces, keep noodles slightly dry, and serve with chili vinegar and soy sauce.
Use fresh cucumbers and olives, add feta cheese generously, and serve the dressing separately.
Brush with extra butter just before serving and make sure the naan stays soft and warm.
Serve hot with a sprinkle of black pepper, add extra shredded chicken, and keep the broth light but flavorful.
Include fresh lettuce and tomatoes, add a light layer of mayonnaise, and toast the bread slightly for crunch.
Grill evenly on both sides, brush with rosemary butter, and serve with mint chutney and a lemon wedge.
Use fresh prawns, make it medium spicy, and serve with steamed basmati rice and lemon slices.
Add extra chicken and cheese layers, avoid pickles, and serve with french fries and tomato ketchup.
